actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To amend title IV of the Social Security Act to coordinate the penalty for the failure of a State to operate a State child support disbursement unit with the alternative penalty procedure for failures to meet data processing requirements.

summary.text: Child Support Penalty Fairness Act - Amends title IV part D (Child Support and Establishment of Paternity) of the Social Security Act to prohibit the Secretary of Health and Human Services from disapproving a State plan for child and spousal support for noncompliance with Federal requirements for State disbursement unit operations while the State is receiving a grant-reduction penalty for noncompliance with Federal requirements for an automated data processing and information retrieval system.

titles.title: To amend title IV of the Social Security Act to coordinate the penalty for the failure of a State to operate a State child support disbursement unit with the alternative penalty procedure for failures to meet data processing requirements.
